long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Look users up by their domains. Access Web 3.0 websites.  
 
EDNS is multi-functional one-stop solution for decentralized domain and hosting, as well as digital identity to access the endless world of NFT, Metaverse and DeFi.  EDNS provides a platform service that issues decentralized domains to users and creates a bridge to facilitate traditional Web 2.0 users to enter the decentralized Web3.0 era.  
 
The EDNS: Domain Tools Extension allows users to look up linked details of domain holders including their wallet address, email address, URL, avatar, description and social media handles. With just a domain, you can define your entire Web 3 identity and find others’ Web 3 details.  
 
EDNS: Domain Tools allows you to:  
 
- Look up linked wallet addresses  
- Look up linked text records including mail address, URL, Avatar, Description and social media handles 
- Access websites linked to the domain 


To learn more about EDNS domains, visit us at https://www.edns.domains/.
